mapper.insert: insert into board values(default, #{title}, #{content}, default, now())
mapper.select:
with like_count as ( select board_id, count(*) as like_cnt from board_like group by board_id )
select b.id, b.title, b.content, ifnull(lc.like_cnt, 0) as likeCount, b.view_count as viewCount, b.write_date as writeDate from board b left outer join like_count lc on(lc.board_id = b.id) order by b.id desc limit #{startIndex}, #{limit}
